{"abstract": "Efforts to tighten oversight of charities have largely failed because of regulatory indifference, political lobbying or lack of political will.", "web_url": "https://www.nytimes.com/2015/05/22/business/patchwork-oversight-allows-dubious-charities-to-operate.html", "snippet": "Efforts to tighten oversight of charities have largely failed because of regulatory indifference, political lobbying or lack of political will.", "lead_paragraph": "James T.
